title: Deidentification-Report.Generate.Input
description: Input messageType for the Deidentification-Report.Generate capability.

dataset.description: Tabular dataset represented as an array of objects.

applied_techniques.description: List of de-identification techniques that were applied to the dataset.

privacy_metrics.description: Optional precomputed privacy metrics (e.g., k-anonymity, l-diversity).

regulatory_frameworks.description: Applicable regulatory or policy frameworks to evaluate against.

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
